lead_paragraph: Delving into the underside of their subculture, a look into the lives of the hard-core fans of present day punk rock in Los Angeles, focusing on the lifestyles and backgrounds of the fans, many of whom are homeless and alcoholic.
snippet: Delving into the underside of their subculture, a look into the lives of the hard-core fans of present day punk rock in Los Angeles, focusing on the lifestyles and backgrounds of the fans, many of whom are homeless and alcoholic.
